title: Lady x Lady -Casa Blanca-
description:
A collection of yuri oneshots:

The Princess Will Someday... - Amane Ruri
I Think I Might Love Her - suto
My First Time with Onee-chan. - Amedamacon
The Solution to Sexlessness! - Suzuki Senpai
Sister Room at Night - Soso-Zagri
Background Girl vs Spotlight Girl - Homura Subaru

Cover by Mitsu (Tendou Itsuki)

matches.title: Suite Precure, Smile Precure!, Dokidoki! Precure - Yuri-Cure!! (Doujinshi)
